metaDescription: Find top-rated financial advisors in Irving. Expert guidance for retirement planning, wealth management, and investment strategies.

advisors.name: Edward Jones - Financial Advisor: Darryl Plunkett
Edward Jones - Financial Advisor: Paul Pittman

heroDescription: Irving, Texas, is a vibrant city in the Dallas-Fort Worth metroplex known for its diverse economy and cultural attractions.
landscapeDescription: With a population of 228,653, Irving is a key player in the Dallas-Fort Worth metro area. The city boasts a robust economy driven by technology, finance, and hospitality.
uniqueNeeds: Irving's diverse population requires tailored financial services and investment strategies to meet varied cultural and economic needs.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Irving's tech and finance sectors face concentration risks; housing prices may bubble. Prepare for tornadoes and flooding. Diversify investments to mitigate economic shocks.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Irving's economy has shown resilience with a growth rate of 3.5%, driven by tech and service sectors.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), the median income in Irving is approximately $70,000, reflecting a diverse economic base.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Irving are increasingly specializing in tech and real estate investments.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), the cost of living in Irving is 5% lower than the national average, making it an attractive place to live.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), the real estate market in Irving is competitive, with home prices rising by 8% year-over-year.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Irving's business climate is favorable, with numerous incentives for startups and established companies alike.
